original_text: ‘He also did bad things in the temple that are against our laws. So we took hold of him. [We wanted to judge him by what our own law says.
korean_text: 그가 또 성전을 더럽게 하려 하므로 우리가 잡았사오니 (6하반-8상반 없음)

sentences.original_text: He also did bad things in the temple
So we took hold of him
by what our own law says
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 자신의 법이 말하는 것에 따라
